Sanity loss

What is the Keeper's option to apply to a skill or characteristic roll?
A bonus die, rolled alongside the usual percentile dice

A bout of madness, which may be 'real time' or 'summary', depending on the situation

To compare physical size, strength, and durability of animate and inanimate objects

the tens die

a bout of madness

Build

Campaign

Campaign

Eight

Other attributes such as Sanity, Magic Points, and Hit Points

Credit Rating

foot or in vehicles

A 1D100 result of "01" is always a success and the best result possible

H. P. Lovecraft

What is the purpose of the Cthulhu Mythos skill?
To determine a character's knowledge of the true gods, entities, monsters, and fiendish lore of the cosmos

What is the Cthulhu Mythos skill?
A skill used to determine a character’s knowledge of the true gods, entities, monsters, and fiendish lore of the cosmos (see page 61)

What is damage in the game?
Attacks and accidents are said to “do damage”—that is, to create wounds or injuries

How is the Damage Bonus calculated?
Derived by adding STR and SIZ together and referencing the total on Table 1: Damage Bonus (see page 33)

To create wounds or injuries
